title: [SOLVED]820-3662 no keyboard / mouse
message:
Hi Guys I have an 820-3662 that we repaired before, liquid damage. That time we fixed the SC-Card reader which was stopping the mac from booting, replaced a resistor and all was OK (also cleaned with ultrasonic cleaner). Now few month later both trackpad and keyboard dont work, mac boots to login screen. We tried all combinations of new KBD/Trackpad nothing worked so assume its a logic board issue. HWT says there might be an issue with Mouse/KBD/Thunderbold. I checked the voltages on KBD and Mouse connector and all are present: 5V, 3.42v and 3.3v. Any idea what i should check more?

EDIT:  WS_KBD_ONOFF_L = 3.3

title: [SOLVED]820-3662 no keyboard / mouse
message: Yes have 3.3v on pin 22 and 49 from U4801. R also have the correct ohm values. Have 3.3 also on TPAD_VBUS_EN.

title: [SOLVED]820-3662 no keyboard / mouse
message:
Known good trackpad? Bad trackpad will also mess up the keyboard. Check in OSX if the keyboard/trackpad are listed under USB devices.
Also diode mode on the trackpad connector. Check for corroded traces.

title: [SOLVED]820-3662 no keyboard / mouse
message: It was a corroded trace, thanks duke! Can be closed.
